channel.title: Need some help
channel.description:
well currently i am working on a server and well yeah im mostly a noob .. i have leeched a few things but i mostly made alot of things myself .. so yeah im a noob and im proud :D
well my stat's look like 135/99 .. im using a testscape source and is there a way to change it so it looks like 135/135? also is there a way to set a max exp value?
well sorry if this is a nooby question but yeah if you help me thanks for the help tim
dont flame me too please ;)[br][size=1]Posted at: August 20, 2006, 04:36:58 PM[/size][hr]anyone?[br][size=1]Posted at: August 20, 2006, 08:56:23 PM[/size][hr]who wants to help me :)
